page.prototype: .Verify as A5Storage::CallResult (ConnectionStringIn as C [, ConnectionStringPassphrase as C])

argument.name: ConnectionStringIn
argument.description: The connection string to be verified.

argument.name: ConnectionStringPassphrase
argument.description: The passphrase used to encrypt the connection string (if any).

return.name: result
return.description: A CallResult object with properties that describe any error returned. Check the Success property to see if the function succeeded.
